full_summary:
### W0125-24WR01 7 Ton Demag Overhead Crane Repairs

#### Request for Proposal
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking bids for the repair of a 7-ton Demag overhead crane. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing a qualified technician to perform repairs and parts replacement on the crane for the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Bidding Details

*   **Bid Submission Deadline**: 2023-07-11 at 14:00 EDT
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Nunavut Territory and Trenton

#### Bidding Requirements
Bidders are required to submit a comprehensive proposal outlining their approach, methodology, and pricing for the repair of the crane.

#### Contact Information
For more information or to obtain the bid documents, please contact:
Alexa Fraser (SPAC/PSPC)
alexa.fraser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: N/A
Fax: N/A


This is a [link]( http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16663329?extsite=MTY2NjMzMjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to the complete bidding document on Ariba Discovery. 
All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba or CanadaBuys. No paper submissions will be accepted. All late bids will be ruled non-responsive and disqualified from the competition. Please disregard any automated e-mails regarding bid closing due to the amended closing time. Canada is not responsible for delays or errors resulting from late or misdirected e-mails that exceed the bidding deadline. 

Note: All prices are based on Canadian Currency. The Government of Canada is subject to the Canada Hindu International Tendering Act and is using the World Intellectual Regulations Bidding Procedures.  By bidding, you certify that you have read and understand the terms and conditions and will execute the contract accordingly. Your bid must include all necessary documentation including but not limited to Canadian Business License and Niche as unique Bearing C Types And Shake Phys Craig. Bid must be original and cannot be altered, deleted or amended. Bidders must create a unique file name for this bid, and annotations to documents. The assessment criteria chosen are Price. The tender support should be designed to allow all or some submissions to go directly to the assessment committee based on the proposed milestones and quality. Non-res
